multiversion:
    needs: build
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    strategy:
      matrix:
        node-version: [13.x, 14.x] # 12.x skip, previous build node version is 12.x

    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v2
      - name: Use Node.js ${{ matrix.node-version }}
        uses: actions/setup-node@v1
        with:
          node-version: ${{ matrix.node-version }}
      - run: npm install -g hexo-cli gulp-cli typescript ts-node
      - run: npm ci --save
      - run: npx hexo generate
